source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_00<tab>Francel has his eyes set on your next and final destination.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_00<tab>クイックサンドのフランセルは、最後の商談へ向かうようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_01<tab>Encouraged by the success you experienced in both Gridania and Ul'dah, Francel has high hopes that negotiations in your final destination─Limsa Lominsa─will likewise bear fruit. Lord Charlemend, still deeply bitter about the disappearance of his son at sea some twenty years ago, is not keen to pay a visit to a den of pirates, but swallows his pride in hopes of avenging his loss by securing a trade agreement that will bring prosperity to his house and homeland alike. With a mixture of trepidation and anticipation, you set off for Limsa's Bulwark Hall to reunite with your companions.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_01<tab>フランセルと話し、シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵の心持ちが少し変化したのを感じた。最後の商談のため、リムサ・ロミンサのブルワークホールに向かった「シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵」を追おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in Limsa, where Lord Charlemend─as is his wont─is quick to express his displeasure with his surroundings. Francel, however, cannot help but remark that the count's temperament seems to have mellowed some over the course of the journey. You make for Mealvaan's Gate, eager to break new ground in your mission.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_02<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵やフランセルと話し、情報収集へ向かうことになった。メルヴァン税関公社へ向かった「シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_03<tab>At Mealvaan's Gate, an uncharacteristically diplomatic Lord Charlemend inquires with an assessor as to whether anyone in town might be willing to discuss a potential trade agreement with Ishgard. Though visibly dismayed to find out that this will involve a parley with pirates, he nevertheless resigns himself to the task. For your part, you resolve to follow him and Francel to the Missing Member to see if the Sanguine Sirens might be amenable to the offer.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_03<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵、フランセルと共に、メルヴァン税関公社で話を聞いた。リムサ・ロミンサの永遠の乙女亭前の「シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_04<tab>You accompany your friends to the Missing Member, where Lord Charlemend's best efforts to negotiate with Captain Rhoswen fall embarrassingly short of the mark. Doubtless lacking in experience dealing with rougher types, the nobleman is somewhat shaken, but not quite ready to abandon his efforts. Together with Lord Francel, you follow the count to the Seventh Sage, in hopes that the Krakens might prove a more receptive audience.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_04<tab>永遠の乙女亭でローズウェンから話を聞いたが、彼女は取引を行う気はないようだ。最後の望みを託して薬舗セブンスセージに向かい、「シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_05<tab>Though the receptionist at the Seventh Sage is less overtly hostile than was Rhoswen, she makes it clear that─for reasons that are not entirely evident─she has been strictly forbidden from conducting business of any sort with Ishgard. Just when you fear all hope is lost, the conversation is interrupted by a message from none other than the captain himself, who apparently has agreed to entertain the offer, on the condition that it is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> and you alone who presents it. Curious as to the reason for this, but not wishing to waste the opportunity, you make your way to the balcony for a parley with the pirate leader.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_05<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵たちと薬舗セブンスセージの受付に交易を持ちかけたが、煮え切らない返事だった。しかし、冒険者だけなら話を聞いてくれるそうなので、薬舗セブンスセージの裏にいる「カルヴァラン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_06<tab>Welcoming you to his inner sanctum, Carvallain carefully weighs your offer, eventually agreeing to the terms presented. It would appear that, despite his many misgivings, he is willing to invest in the idea that the nation of Ishgard has truly entered a new age of enlightenment, and that a partnership─albeit a limited one─with the Count de Durendaire might be for the best, after all. Forcing you to swear a promise that you will divulge not his name nor anything about him to your associates, the pirate captain provides you with a written agreement to deliver to Lord Charlemend, and sends you on your way.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_06<tab>カルヴァランと話し、取引に対する真意を聞いた。取引を承諾してくれたので、薬舗セブンスセージの前で待っている「シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E901D01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_07<tab>You hand over the document to Lord Charlemend, who is overcome with astonishment at hearing that your negotiation was a success. Though doubtless wishing he could have done the deed himself, the results are impossible for him to argue with, and─in uncharacteristic fashion─he expresses his sincere gratitude for your efforts on his house's behalf. Lord Francel, for his part, is delighted as well, as it is now clear that your mission has been an unqualified success─it is but a matter of time now until the markets of Featherfall flourish with a lively exchange of wares from all corners of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_07<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E901D01 /var>を渡した。無事に契約が取れて、デュランデル伯爵とフランセルは大喜びだ。

target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_SEQ_08<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Charlemend at Bulwark Hall in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_00<tab>ブルワークホールのシャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Charlemend.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_01<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Charlemend in front of the Missing Member.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_02<tab>永遠の乙女亭前のシャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Charlemend once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_03<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵と再度話す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Carvallain.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_04<tab>カルヴァランと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the contract to Charlemend.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_TODO_05<tab>シャルルマン・ド・デュランデル伯爵に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E901D01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_000<tab>Are you ready to take to the road again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Our final destination awaits us─Limsa Lominsa!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_000では、最後の商談のために、
リムサ・ロミンサに向かいましょうか！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>Hmph...if we must.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>………………やはり海都にも行くのか。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab>...Though if you truly expect to find a reliable trading partner in that den of pirates and ruffians, you are even more of a fool than I thought.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_002ふん、あそこは海賊が取り仕切る野蛮な都市だろう。
取引に足る相手がいるか、甚だ疑問だな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_003<tab>Believe me, Lord Charlemend, when I say that I bear no love for barbarous outlaws. That said, by all accounts things have changed much in the years since Admiral Bloefhiswyn rose to power.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_003確かに、略奪行為を働く海賊への抵抗感は否めません。
ですが、メルウィブ提督が政権を担うようになってからは、
随分と情勢が変わってきたと聞きます。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>I have spoken of my son's disappearance to you in the past, have I not? If by chance you have forgotten, it was those accursed pirates who took him from me, and for that I will never forgive them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_004……以前、我が息子が行方不明となった話はしたな？
その直接の原因となったのが、海賊だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_005<tab>It was twenty long years ago. He was a boy of great promise, possessed of a curious mind and a burning desire to see the world. Then a murderous band of sea reavers raided his vessel, and...just like that, he was gone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_005あやつは聡く優秀だったが、見聞を広めるための旅路の中で、
海賊に襲撃され……行方知れずとなったのだ……。
もう、20年も前のことだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_006<tab>To this day, the rumors reach my ears. That he rots in a gaol deep beneath the city. Or that someone resembling him has been seen wandering the streets. As his father, I want to believe he still lives somewhere, but there is only so long a man can...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_006その後は海都で捕虜になっているとか、似た人物を見かけたとか、
不思議と噂は絶えず耳に入ってくるため、
どこかで生きていると信じてはいるが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_007<tab>...Ahem. What I mean to say is, I would not trust a pirate half as far as I could throw him. They are the scourge of our realm and my house, and I will have nothing to do with them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_007つまるところ海賊は、信用がおけんということだ。
自慢のひとり息子を奪い、我が家を混乱に陥れた奴らなど。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_008<tab>You have my most heartfelt sympathies for the loss of your son, Lord Charlemend.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_008何年前であろうとも、
ご子息を失った悲しみが癒えることなどないでしょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_009<tab>By no means do I wish to open old wounds and stir up painful memories. Pray return to Ishgard ahead of us. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I shall handle matters from here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_009閣下、どうかご無理なさらず。
今回の商談は僕と)) (( )) 02 /var>、
ふたりで行ってくることもできますから。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_010<tab>...No. I will accompany you.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_010<tab>…………いいや、私も行く。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_011<tab>Regardless of what happened─nay, precisely <var 1A 02 /var>because<var 1A 01 /var> of it─I will not shirk my duty as lord of House Durendaire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_011息子のことはあるが、
いや息子がいないからこそ、私が行くのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_012<tab>I will march into that wretched hive of murder and villainy and seize from it a new age of prosperity for my house as due retribution for all they have taken from me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_012我がデュランデル家の権益と、一族郎党を守るため……
当主たる私が異国との交易をとりつけ、
新時代の時流に適応していることを示さねばならぬ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_013<tab>If it is what you wish, my lord. Let us be on our way.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_013<tab>わかりました、では海都に向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_014<tab>My preliminary research has led me to conclude that the area known as Bulwark Hall, a stone's throw from the airship landing, would make for a suitable place to commence our efforts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_014リムサ・ロミンサは、ランディングからでたところに、
「ブルワークホール」という広場があるらしいね。
そこを目指そう、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_020<tab>Drunkards and ruffians, the lot of them. Rumors be damned, how anyone could even imply that my son might be found among them is beyond me...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_020ふん……活気のある酒場だが……
人の多いところへくると、つい息子のおもかげを探してしまう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_021<tab>I still remember the sparkle in his eye the day he told me he meant to leave the See on a journey around the...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_021あやつは見聞を広めるための旅路の中で、
海賊に襲撃され……行方知れずとなったのだ……。
もう、20年も前のことだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_022<tab>...Ahem. I would thank you to leave me alone with my thoughts for a while.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_022だがその後も、海都で捕虜になっているとか、
似た人物を見かけたとか、不思議と噂は絶えず耳に入ってくる。
生きているのならなぜ、帰ってこられないのか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_025<tab>So this is Limsa Lominsa! Why, it is even livelier than I imagined!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_025ここが海都、リムサ・ロミンサ……！
冒険者や商人が、たくさんいるんだね！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_030<tab><sniff> The Fury take me...how can all these people abide that gods-awful stench of salt and brine in the air!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_030ここが海都か。
潮風がべたついて不快だが……
活気には、目を見張るものがあるな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_031<tab>Let us conclude our business swiftly and take our leave of this place. Lord Francel...I trust that your <var 1A 02 /var>research<var 1A 01 /var> has enlightened you as to where we might find a suitable trading partner?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_031フランセル卿、
貴殿のことだ、この街についても調べているのだろう？
商会の情報収集に良さそうなところは、どこか教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_032<tab>Indeed it has, Lord Charlemend! I have read that all goods incoming and outgoing must pass inspection at a place called Mealvaan's Gate. No doubt that would be a productive place to begin our inquiry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_032はい！
ええっと……交易に関することは、
「メルヴァン税関公社」で取り扱っているようです。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_033<tab>...Hmph, I see. Very well, then, let us be off to this Mealvaan's Gate, or whatever the place was called.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_033では、さっそく向かおうではないか。
その税関公社とやらは、こちらか？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_034<tab>Perhaps it is but wishful thinking on my part, but would you not say Lord Charlemend has softened some since we arrived here in Limsa? Why, he even waited for me to complete a full utterance before dashing off. Could it be that we have earned his trust?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_034)) (( )) 02 /var>、
デュランデル伯爵の言動、少し柔らかくなった気がしない？
僕たちのことを、信用し始めてくれているのかもね！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_040<tab>So this is where they conduct inspections on all goods imported to Limsa Lominsa. Most fascinating! I simply must take notes for future reference...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_040なるほど……。
ここで交易品の検査をするんだね！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_045<tab>Yes? What business have ye at Mealvaan's Gate?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_045こちら、メルヴァン税関公社です。
いかがされました？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_050<tab>You are employed here, yes? My companions and I hail from Ishgard, and we have come to Limsa to discuss matters of trade.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_050貴殿はメルヴァン税関公社の職員か？
交易について、訊ねたいことがあるのだが……

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_051<tab>Then ye've most definitely come to the right place! Any inquiries ye may have regarding duties, tariffs, prohibited goods, and what-have-ye, I or one of my fellow assessors would be more than happy to enlighten ye!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_051おやおや、異国のお客様ですね～？
関税の徴収から禁制品の摘発まで、交易に関わるアレコレは、
税関公社にお任せくださ～い！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_052<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_053<tab>...I see. To be precise, we seek to introduce wares from your nation to our own homeland, where we believe such items would be in demand. Might you be able to recommend to us a trader dealing in such wares?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_053ふむ……我々は、皇都にはないような品を、
扱っている商会との取引を望んでいるのだが……。
こちらから紹介してもらうことは、できようか？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_054<tab>Aye, but of course! Why didn't ye say so sooner, my good man!? In that case, ye'll be wantin' to talk to one o' the three great pirate powers here in town.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_054<tab>それならば、「三大海賊」がオススメですね～？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_100_054<tab>...Pirates!?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_100_054<tab>……海賊だと！？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_055<tab>Aye! 'Course, since the signin' of the Galadion Accord, they're more of an officially sanctioned agency, raidin' the Garleans at the Admiral's behest, takin' part in honest trade, and the like.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_055はい～、海賊といってもガラディオン協定に参加した彼らは、
私掠船免許を得て帝国船を襲う、政庁公認の組織なんです～。
最近では、まっとうな交易だってしてるんですよ～。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_056<tab>'Least, that much can be said o' the Sanguine Sirens and the Krakens. The Bloody Executioners are a whole 'nother matter, so I'd recommend ye limit any dealin' and negotiatin' ye feel like partakin' in to the former two.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_056ただ、「断罪党」はゴタゴタ続きですからね～。
交渉するなら「紅血聖女団」か「百鬼夜行」を推しますよ～。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_057<tab>I reckon the Sanguine Sirens would be as good a start as any, as they're known to be a bit more welcomin' to outsiders like yerselves. Ye'll find them over in the tavern known as the Missin' Member, if yer up for a parley.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_057まずは、リムサ・ロミンサ近海を縄張りにする、
紅血聖女団に、声をかけてみたらいかがでしょう～？
彼女たちなら「永遠の乙女亭」で接触できますよ～。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_058<tab>...Yes, I do believe I've heard enough. Thank you for your time, and good day.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_058<tab>うむ、感謝する。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_059<tab>I can scarce believe it has come to this, but I suppose we have no recourse. Well, Lord Francel? I trust you know the way to this “Missing Member”...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_059ではさっそく「永遠の乙女亭」とやらに行ってみるぞ。
フランセル卿、案内してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_065<tab>Should ye cut yourself a deal, don't forget to report all yer imports and exports to Mealvaan's Gate. Otherwise, we'll claim what's due one way or the other...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CUSTOMS03957_000_065取引が成立して交易をする場合には、
忘れずに我が社を通してくださいね～。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_068<tab>This is my first time visiting an actual den of pirates. I must confess, I am rather excited and intimidated by it all!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_068<tab>ここが永遠の乙女亭だね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_069<tab>Everyone is here, yes? Then let us be on our way.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_069<tab>そろったな、では行くぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_070<tab>By the Fury! Why, it's a veritable haven of pirate wenches...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_070な、なんとおぞましい……！
ここは女海賊たちの巣窟か……！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_071<tab>...But I will not back down from this challenge. Watch closely, Lord Francel, and let me show you how a deal is made.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_071い、いや、しかしここで引くわけにはいかん。
いいいいい行くぞ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_072<tab>Greetings, and welcome to the Missing Member! Do you have a reservation, sir?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_072いらっしゃいませー！
ご予約のお客様ですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_073<tab>I...I do not. I have come from Ishgard to discuss matters of trade with the captain of the esteemed Sanguine Sirens, and I was told I might find her here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_073い、いや、私たちは「紅血聖女団」の頭に会いに来たのだ。
皇都イシュガルドとの交易を持ちかけにな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_074<tab>You were, were you? Why, yes...I suppose you might. Make yourself comfortable and I'll go let the captain know that she's got a new vict─er, visitor.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_074ああ、それなら、
私がローズウェン姐さんを呼んできますよ！
少々お待ちくださいね！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_075<tab>The 'ells ye want, drylanders? State yer business quick, and ye'd best hope it's worth my while, else me Sirens'll see ye gutted and sleepin' with the fishes before ye knew what cuffed ye!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_075なんだい、あんたたちは。
あたしをこうやって呼びつけるなんて、
それなりの覚悟はできてんだろうね？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_076<tab>P-Pray stay your hand, ah...my lady. I meant only to consult with you on a p-potential business proposition that might prove...ahem...mutually b-beneficial.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_076い、いや、あの、その……！
我々は、貴女にいい話を持ってきたのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_077<tab>I hail from the nation of Ishgard, and I...ah, do believe that your fine wares would be most highly s-sought after in our nation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_077イシュガルドと交易し、
こちらは特産品を、そちらは貿易で手に入れた品を、
それぞれやり取りできないかと思ってな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_078<tab>Ishgard!? Ye must be daft to think any pirate in 'er right mind would have even 'alf a mind to set one foot in some bleedin' snow-swept wasteland at the edge o' the world!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_078ああん、イシュガルドォォッ！？
山ばかりで海がなくって、その上クソ寒いところだろ？
あたしら海賊に、そんなところへ来いっていうのかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_079<tab>Ye must have me confused with that puffy-shirted captain o' the Krakens, or someone else who's got more swagger than sense. Now get out o' my sight before I cut out yer blabbin' tongue an' toss it into tonight's stew!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_079ふん、お断りだね。
そんなとんちきな話を聞き入れてくれるのは、
へたれの率いる「百鬼夜行」くらいなもんだろうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_080<tab>A thousand p-pardons, my lady. I shall take my leave anon and s-seek out these K-Krakens of whom you speak.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_080そうか、それは残念だ……。
では、その百鬼夜行とやらに会いに行ってみるしかないな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_081<tab>I th-thank you for your kindness, and wish you and your S-Sirens all the─
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_081<tab>「紅血聖女団」の頭よ、感謝する。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_082<tab>I said <var 1A 02 /var>get out of my<var 1A 01 /var>─wait a bleedin' minute. Why does that self-righteous face o' yers seem so bloody familiar...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_082…………んん？
そういやあんたの顔、
どことなく「あいつ」に似ているような…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_083<tab>Bah, never mind. I've bigger fish to gut. Now begone from here, or ye'll be joinin' 'em!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_083いや、きっとあたしの勘違いだ。
さっさと行っちまいな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_084<tab>If I were you, I'd be taking her advice to heart. You'll find the Krakens at the Seventh Sage, just past here and beyond the Drowning Wench. I do hope your parley there proves more...fruitful.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_084「百鬼夜行」は、ここから溺れた海豚亭を通り抜けた先、
薬舗「セブンスセージ」を根城にしてますよ。
いってらっしゃいー。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_090<tab>Considering his son's tragic disappearance at sea, one can only imagine the complex emotions the count must be feeling. Let us tread lightly, friend.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_090デュランデル伯爵は、ご子息のことを話してから、
なにか思うところがあったのだろうね。
僕はでしゃばらずに見守るよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_095<tab>I could swear I've seen that smug old bastard's self-satisfied mug somewhere before, but bugger me if I could tell ye where...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_RHOSWEN_000_095あのおっさん……
カルヴァランに似てたような気がしたんだけどね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_098<tab>Have you been to the Seventh Sage yet? I suspect the Krakens will give you a warmer welcome than you found here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_MELKOKO_000_098「百鬼夜行」は、ここから溺れた海豚亭を通り抜けた先、
薬舗「セブンスセージ」を根城にしてますよ。
いってらっしゃいー。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_099<tab>Welcome to the Seventh Sage! Would you care to peruse our diverse array of exotic herbs and spices?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_099いらっしゃいませ。
薬舗「セブンスセージ」へようこそ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_100<tab>...Ahem. Pardon me, my good lady. I am Charlemend of House Durendaire, and I have traveled to your fair nation from Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_100薬舗の主人よ、突然失礼する。
我はデュランデル家の当主、シャルルマンである。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_101<tab>Might you or any of your colleagues perchance be interested in selling your fine spices in my homeland? I can assure you many of my countrymen would be willing to pay a handsome price for them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_101この店の良質なスパイス……
イシュガルドで売り込んでみるつもりはないだろうか？
ぜひ、交易について検討してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_102<tab>D-Durendaire, did you say!? I, ah...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_102デュ、デュランデル家！？
あ、いえ…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_103<tab>...My sincere apologies, good sir, but in accordance with...ah...company policy, we are not entering into partnerships with parties from the Holy See at this time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_103上からの厳格な指示により、
イシュガルドとの大口取引は行わないと決まっております。
申し訳ございません。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_104<tab>No parties from the Holy See...? What insular, closed-minded nonsense is─
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_104<tab>なんっ……だと…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_105<tab>...Ahem. What I mean to say is, we are prepared to make the arrangement <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> appetizing to you. As appetizing as salted harbor herring, one might say.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_105いや、聞いてくれ。
そなたらにも、もちろん利はある。
私掠船を運用するとなれば、遠洋航海が欠かせぬのだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_106<tab>To wit: our astrologians have devised a method to accurately gauge one's present location and bearing regardless of the season, a technique which I do believe would be most beneficial to esteemed privateers such as yourselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_106我が一族の星読みは、
季節によらず位置や方位を正確にはじき出せる。
より安全な航海を実現すべく、その知識を伝授しよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_107<tab>To think the old man would be willing to reveal a treasured house secret to outsiders─dastardly, despicable <var 1A 02 /var>pirates<var 1A 01 /var>, no less...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_107家の権益のために、あんなに固執していた星読みの技術を、
他国の……それも、海賊にくれてやろうとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_108<tab>...Perhaps there's hope for Ishgard yet.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_108<tab>……………………変わるものだな、人も、国も。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_109<tab>...Ahem. Pray excuse me for a moment.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_109<tab>あ、ちょっと失礼。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_110<tab>C-Captain!? Why, yes. Worry not. I was just about to bid our guest farewell, as per your explicit orders not to─
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_110…………と、頭領！？
はい、はい、お申しつけどおり、
イシュガルドとの交易には、お断りをいれているところで……

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_111<tab>Wh-What's that? Are you certain? ...I see. I'll convey the message, then. Forgive me for my hasty decision.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_111…………え！？
あ、はい、わかりました……。
ええ、失礼します。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_112<tab>...Ahem. The captain says he will entertain your proposition, but on one condition: he will only speak to the adventurer here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_112ええと……
頭領が「冒険者となら話をする」と言ってます。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_113<tab>...I see. In that case, I have little choice. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it? I have done little to deserve your charity, but I would ask you this one favor. Might I entrust the negotiations to you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_113…………英雄殿。
すまぬが、行ってきてくれるか。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_114<tab>Very well, then. If you would come this way...
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_114<tab>それで英雄様、ちょっと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_115<tab>Captain Carvallain of the Krakens awaits you atop the stairs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_115我らが百鬼夜行の頭領「カルヴァラン」様は、
隣の階段を上がった先におられます。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_116<tab>One more thing: you are by <var 1A 02 /var>no<var 1A 01 /var> means to speak his name, nor describe his face to anyone from Ishgard, or he will <var 1A 02 /var>personally<var 1A 01 /var> have you keelhauled. No hard feelings, of course.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_ZRANMAIA_000_116わけあって頭領の名前は、
イシュガルドのお方の前では出せないので……
どうかご内密に、お願いいたしますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_120<tab>I place my full trust in you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. May the negotiations be a success!
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_120<tab>頼んだよ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_125<tab>I know not what you have done to earn a pirate captain's trust, but─in this rarest of cases─I am most thankful for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_125なぜ百鬼夜行の頭領が、貴殿を重用するのかわからぬが……
頼んだぞ、英雄殿。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_130<tab>My associate has apprised me of the situation. So this delegation from the See wishes to establish trade relations with us, do they?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_130話は聞いていましたよ。
イシュガルドと我々の交易を、とりつけたいのでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_131<tab>The Ishgardians...consumed only with their petty war...living out their days in that gloomy, frigid land devoid of passion or imagination... Just thinking back to my dreary days in that miserable place is enough to make me ill.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_131あの国はいつも、
竜との戦争のことしか考えていなかった。
暗く、寒く、閉塞的で……未だに反吐が出るほど嫌っています。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_132<tab>But with the war's end, it would appear that a new wind blows in my homeland...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_132ですが……
竜詩戦争の終結によって、少しは気運が変わったようですね。
変革の風が吹き始めたようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_133<tab>While I am not so naive to assume that they have left their past entirely behind, I will trust that the See's desire to change─as well as that of the man who has come to me on their behalf─is sincere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_133先祖伝来の知識まで売り込もうという伯爵閣下の気概と、
開国を決断した皇都の未来に賭ける、という意味を込めて、
取引に応じても構いませんよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_134<tab>...Besides, it would not hurt to be owed a debt of gratitude by one of Eorzea's greatest heroes, no?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_134各国で名をあげている英雄に、
貸しを作っておくのも悪くないですからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_135<tab>Anything to keep that most fearsome Lalafellin acquaintance of yours from making things <var 1A 02 /var>difficult<var 1A 01 /var> for me...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_135貴方たちを乗せて、東方に船をだしたときのように……。
あの手強いララフェル族のお嬢さんに、
また出てこられても、困りますからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_136<tab>Gerald! The document.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_136<tab>ゲラルド、例のものを。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_137<tab>This here is an agreement consenting to the formal commencement of trade between the Krakens and House Durendaire of Ishgard. It is in Gerald's name, and marked with our official seal to authorize the transaction.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_137これは、スパイス取引に関する契約書です。
事情により、ゲラルドの名前を代理として立てているが、
こちら側のサインもしてあります。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_138<tab>I would appreciate if you could deliver this to the <var 1A 02 /var>Count de Durendaire<var 1A 01 /var> on my behalf.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_138これを持って、
「デュランデル伯爵」のところへお戻りなさい。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_GERALD_000_139<tab>Are you quite sure about this, Captain?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_GERALD_000_139<tab>……頭領、良かったんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_GERALD_100_139<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_GERALD_100_139<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_100_139<tab>Let us be thankful for that adventurer showing up when <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> did. If that man had forced his way to my office, I shudder to think of what might have ensued.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_100_139ふん、英雄が同行していてくれて助かりましたよ。
「あの人」がここまで乗り込んできたら、
どうしようかと思いました。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_140<tab>'Tis strange, though... For long years the mere sight of the man's face filled me with loathing. But seeing it again now, I feel only this odd sense of...nostalgia.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_140皇都の忌まわしい因習を体現したかのような、あの姿……
幼い頃はあれほど嫌っていたのに、
久しぶりに見かけてみると、不思議と懐古の念に駆られてしまう。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_141<tab>And yet, I dare not entertain the thought of doing anything more. It would only serve to undo all I have accomplished.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_141だが、会ってしまえば、
せっかく変わりつつある「あの人」を、
また過去に引き戻すことになるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_142<tab>...No, I have no mind to give up my freedom for whatever I might gain in its place. Yes, this will do...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_142私も、ひとたび掴んだ自由を手放す気はありません。
…………だから、良いんですよ、これで。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_150<tab>Dare I ask how you fared in there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_150<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうだった……？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_155<tab>The Count de Durendaire is waiting. I suggest you deliver the document with all speed─I have it on good account that he is not a patient man.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CARVALLAIN_000_155「デュランデル伯爵」が待っているのでは？
早く戻って「」を渡した方が、
いいのではありませんかね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_160<tab>Well? Do you have anything to show for your efforts?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_160<tab>英雄殿、「百鬼夜行」の頭領はなんと？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_161<tab>Why, this is...more than I dared to hope we would achieve! However did you manage this!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_161こ、これは……！
スパイス交易の契約書ではないか！
ど、どんな手腕を使って説得したのだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_001<tab>Your passionate plea won him over.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_001<tab>伯爵の熱心さに心打たれたようだ

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_002<tab>He chose to believe in Ishgard's future.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_002<tab>イシュガルドの未来に賭けてみるらしい

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_003<tab>I made him an offer he couldn't refuse.
target: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_A1_000_003<tab>顔を立ててもらった

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_162<tab>You mean...he was listening in on our discussion? I...I am not quite sure what to say...
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_162そ、そうか？
その者は、我々のやり取りを聞いていたのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_163<tab>He did? Pirate or no, this man clearly has done his research on our great nation, and I commend him for his wisdom and prescience.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_163そうか、それはありがたい限りだ。
その者は、皇都の事情をよく知っているのだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_164<tab>An offer? What sort of─ Hm, never mind. I will trust that you have more experience in these matters than I.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_164そ、そうか。
さすがだな、英雄殿！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_165<tab>At any rate, I have finally accomplished that which I sought to here in Eorzea, and can finally return to Ishgard in triumph, as befitting the lord of the highest of houses.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_CHARLEMEND_000_165ともかく、我が家もついに商談をとりつけたぞ！
これで大手を振って皇都へ戻ることができる！

source: TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_166<tab>I am in your debt, Lord Charlemend. And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. With this, the day that the finest goods from the realm over are traded freely in the markets of Featherfall is all but upon us!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHA203_03957_FRANCEL_000_166はいっ！
ついに蒼天街へ、三国の商会が並ぶんですね……！
楽しみです！
